summary:
The Blades Maybe the most well known of the akaviri dragon hunters but they were not the only ones.

Introducing the Shonobi a Sub group of the Blades focusing on stealth and speed the shonobi prefer light armor with protection only where its vital.
descriptionHtml:
------------------------------
THANKS TO
------------------------------

True Thief Armor-by NewerMind43
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38409/


-----------------------
This armor mod has been needed for a long time the fact that blades armor is heavy only in stoke skyrim is a tragidy with the intoruction of this mod the opening of a series of akaviri armor and weapon mods i aim to fix this and expand on the japanese themed blades orginization.

------------------------------
What This Does
------------------------------

This Mod adds a Set of Light Armors to the game that ar ment to grow with your character by allowing you to upgrade them from a rookie form to starter and then to standard. each upgrade adds onto the armors protection and model while trying to keep a similiar look and feel.

------------------------------
Required
------------------------------

This armor Is For UNPB BBP

It may also work with SeveNBase


------------------------------
Highly Recommended Mods
------------------------------

SHARPE Craftsmanship - Made to orderby Herko ter Horst
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14474

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/
author: JackASpades
